member.name: T:CryptoSpect.Controllers.CryptocurrencyController
member.summary: Provides API endpoints for managing cryptocurrencies.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The service responsible for handling cryptocurrency operations.
The logger used to log events and issues related to the CryptocurrencyController.

member.summary: Retrieves all cryptocurrencies.

member.summary: Retrieves a cryptocurrency by its identifier.

member.summary: Updates an existing cryptocurrency.

The updated cryptocurrency data.

member.name: M:CryptoSpect.Controllers.CryptocurrencyController.DeleteAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a cryptocurrency by its identifier.
